QuestData.Title: At One
QuestData.Description: I was charged with her protection, yet it was she who sacrificed herself for my sake.$b$bI cannot bear to lose her, $n. I must make a solemn request of you.$b$bNever has a mortal borne the essence of a true dragon, but with your permission I would make an exception.$b$bPlease, while there is life in her, will you allow me to bind Tarecgosa to you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kalecgos to agree to his proposition.
